name: kell
description: the simplest and smallest code editor for web, with no dependencies

scripts.size: echo 'minified & gzipped:' && echo -n 'JS: ' && gzip-size dist/kell.min.js && echo -n 'CSS: ' && gzip-size dist/kell.min.css
scripts.build: npm run --silent min-js && npm run --silent sort-css && npm run --silent min-css && npm run --silent size
